oceantherapy.description: The ocean is a natural therapy for restoring the nervous system. Contact with the water reduces stress levels, stimulates brain activity and promotes emotional relaxation.

bestSpot.title: Surfing Capital of Europe
bestSpot.description: Hossegor, France, is a unique place in the Landes region, known for its royal forests and majestic dunes. Surfing on sandy beaches where the waves of the Atlantic meet the green forests is a highlight. The area is famous not only for its wild natural beauty but also for its delicious cuisine, where you can enjoy local delicacies.

bestSpot.title: Island of Eternal Spring
bestSpot.description: São Miguel, the largest island of the Azores, captivates with its perfect waves and picturesque beaches. It offers optimal conditions for surfing where the powerful Atlantic waves provide true therapy for the body and soul. The island impresses with its natural beauty: green hills, lakes, and volcanic beaches create an unforgettable atmosphere.
